column14: Very simple way for a streamer to engage with their chat in a cool way, i feel like this could expand to even more types of games, like an integration for other games to make the streamer sort of do challenges within a game.

i think its a completely different experience as a viewer. if i were totally fried in the brain i would maybe rather like the one where its just a guy talking, but this is a lot more fun in general i think

column12: dunno what is so special about those streaming features, the commentary is quite boring, it doesn't explain what the game is about all that much, doesn't give any interesting tips or try to be entertaining really. the gameplay looks too slow and repetitive to get into it and it requires constant attention of the streamer so feels like it would be difficult to split attention to the chat without pausing the game. And 10 min feels like too long for the same stuff
Text awkwardly spaced in boxes, UI font sizing feels inconsistent
column13: Fix fonts wandering out of boxes, add a combo multiplier to encourage uptime, add enemies that buff other enemies (make them faster, etc), add an option for rerolling level up bonuses so players can chase more specific builds

column12: The sound of the stream is low so I had to increase volume to hear the streamer
column13: Add different colors for the stream effects depending on target group of viewers and add some background music for the game
column14: I would check if there is possibility to add more user interaction, so user could potentially speak in the voice chat if that is possible
